sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO imgtemp ( ORGNZT_CODE /* */ , ERNCSL_SE /* */ , IMAGE_INFO /* */ , IMAGE_TY /* */ ) VALUES ( #orgnztCode# /* */ , #erncslSe# /* */ , #imageInfo# /* */ , #imageTy# /* */ )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE imgtemp SET ORGNZT_CODE=#orgnztCode# /* */ , ERNCSL_SE=#erncslSe# /* */ , IMAGE_INFO=#imageInfo# /* */ , IMAGE_TY=#imageTy# /* */ WHERE ORGNZT_CODE=#orgnztCode# /* */ AND ERNCSL_SE=#erncslSe# /* */
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM imgtemp WHERE ORGNZT_CODE=#orgnztCode# /* */ AND ERNCSL_SE=#erncslSe# /* */
sqlMap.select: SELECT ORGNZT_CODE /* */ , ERNCSL_SE /* */ , IMAGE_INFO /* */ , IMAGE_TY /* */ FROM imgtemp WHERE ORGNZT_CODE=#orgnztCode# /* */ AND ERNCSL_SE=#erncslSe# /* */

SELECT ORGNZT_CODE /* */ , ERNCSL_SE /* */ , IMAGE_INFO /* */ , IMAGE_TY /* */ FROM imgtemp WHERE 1=1
ORGNZT_CODE = #searchKeyword# /* */
ERNCSL_SE LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
ORDER BY ORGNZT_CODE DESC /* */ , ERNCSL_SE DESC /* */ limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM imgtemp WHERE 1=1
ORGNZT_CODE = #searchKeyword# /* */
ERNCSL_SE LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
